title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Alex Berenson on covid fact and fiction. Masks in schools are madness. Masks don't work. Data from Israel and UK proves vaccine immunity doesn't last. Covid will never go away. We have to live with it. This ends when we want it to end, not because of vaccines. Lockdowns were supposed to prevent hospital system failure, which never occurred, should have been lifted immediately. Nobody knows if boosters will be needed or work. Delta variant vs. vaccine failure. Berenson suspended from Twitter for seven days. People 65 and over should get the vaccine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
